name: Komerolator
description:
A game made with Unity 3D as a school project by a group of three.

You play as a typical unsocial bachelor student holed up in their dorm room. One day, all of a sudden, you're expecting a visit from the hot dormitory janitor know as the mistress of the dorms who you also have a crush on.

How will you survive this encounter?

Individual sound effects from freesound.org

Background looping music from looperman.com:
  • 40A - High Stakes
  • Jonasniemann - Dream Sequence 3
  • Danke - Trap Riser
  • Frogdude34-dngexplosionpiano
  • KoolKat - ChordLoop2
